about_the_game:
Unlock Bao as a new romance option in this Date Z DLC! Partner with her as accidental investigative journalists, uncovering fresh angles on the events at Massville High. Experience exclusive one-on-one moments as you follow trails, expose schemes, and blow the story wide open. Enjoy sneaking around, lockpicking, and unexpected adventures in this special pack!

This DLC gives you:

• Bao as a new romanceable character

• An investigative storyline with unique dialogue options

• Exclusive one-on-one experiences with Bao

• A completely new game ending
